description: Number of points needed to display n on the LCD (liquid-crystal display) of a TI-83 calculator.
comments: a(15) = a(1) + a(5);a(29) = a(2) + a(9) = 29 is the unique term such that a(n) = n.a(10*n+u) = a(n) + a(u) where n >= 1 is a number and u a digit. - _Jean-Marc Rebert_, Aug 02 2015
author: _Jean-Marc Rebert_
